name: Soldiers of Heaven VR
description: Armed with a virtual camera you will film your own 360 VR version of the story as it unfolds in an immersive 3D world. A virtual reality short.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better. Storage: 1 GB available space
